meanings.definition: A person who applies cosmetics professionally.
meanings.sent1: The cosmeticians at the salon helped me choose the perfect lipstick shade.
meanings.sent2: Cosmeticians often work in beauty stores and spas.
meanings.sent3: The cosmeticians at the makeup counter made me look like a movie star!
meanings.sent4: She transformed into a cosmetician, painting her face like a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The skilled cosmeticians knew exactly how to enhance my features.

meanings.definition: A professional who specializes in the application of makeup and skincare products.
meanings.sent1: My friend is training to become a cosmetician and learn all about skincare products.
meanings.sent2: Cosmeticians have a deep understanding of different makeup brands.
meanings.sent3: The cosmeticians at the spa made my skin feel like a baby's!
meanings.sent4: She wielded her brushes like a cosmetician creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The cosmeticians' expertise in makeup application was truly impressive.
